languages.text: {n}Глаза бродяги стекленеют, а нижняя губа начинает подрагивать. Он больше не здесь — он ушел куда-то вглубь себя.{/n} "Я же... Я же и правда когда-то верил. Пока не угодил сюда. А теперь что? Ворую ботинки с трупов и побираюсь среди ксеносов и отбросов. Проклятье, что со мной стало?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза бродяги стекленеют, а нижняя губа начинает подрагивать. Он больше не здесь — он ушел куда-то вглубь себя.{/n} "Я же... Я же и правда когда-то верил. Пока не угодил сюда. А теперь что? Ворую ботинки с трупов и побираюсь среди ксеносов и отбросов. Проклятье, что со мной стало?!"

languages.text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза бродяги стекленеют, а нижняя губа начинает подрагивать. Он больше не здесь — он ушел куда-то вглубь себя.{/n} "Я же... Я же и правда когда-то верил. languages.text: {n}乞食の目はうつろで、下唇が震えている。彼の心はもはやここにはない。内側に閉じ込められてしまった。{/n}「俺は…以前は本気で信じていたんだ。ここに来るまではな。今の俺はどうだ？死体からブーツを盗み、異種族や他のクズどもにスクラップをくれとせがむ。どうしてこんなんなっちまったんだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食の目はうつろで、下唇が震えている。彼の心はもはやここにはない。内側に閉じ込められてしまった。{/n}「俺は…以前は本気で信じていたんだ。ここに来るまではな。今の俺はどうだ？死体からブーツを盗み、異種族や他のクズどもにスクラップをくれとせがむ。どうしてこんなんなっちまったんだろう？」

languages.text: {n}乞丐的目光呆滞，下唇颤抖。他的心思已经不在你身上，开始反思起了自己的过错。{/n}“我……我曾经真的相信过祂，那已经是我来这里之前了。可我现在变成了什么人啊？我从尸体上偷靴子，向异形和别的人渣乞讨残渣剩饭。黄金王座在上啊，我怎么变成了这样的人？”
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐的目光呆滞，下唇颤抖。他的心思已经不在你身上，开始反思起了自己的过错。{/n}“我……我曾经真的相信过祂，那已经是我来这里之前了。可我现在变成了什么人啊？我从尸体上偷靴子，向异形和别的人渣乞讨残渣剩饭。黄金王座在上啊，我怎么变成了这样的人？”

languages.text: {n}Al mendigo se le nublan los ojos y le tiembla el labio inferior. Su mente ya no está aquí, sus pensamientos lo han atrapado.{/n} «Solía creer. Antes de acabar aquí. ¿Y qué soy ahora? Robo botas de cadáveres, mendigo a xenos y otra escoria por sobras. Maldito Trono, ¿qué ha sido de mí?».
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al mendigo se le nublan los ojos y le tiembla el labio inferior. Su mente ya no está aquí, sus pensamientos lo han atrapado.{/n} «Solía creer. Antes de acabar aquí. ¿Y qué soy ahora? Robo botas de cadáveres, mendigo a xenos y otra escoria por sobras. Maldito Trono, ¿qué ha sido de mí?».

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Bettlers trüben sich und seine Unterlippe zittert. Sein Verstand ist nicht mehr hier, seine Gedanken haben sich nach innen gerichtet.{/n} "Ich ... ich war früher wirklich gläubig. Bevor ich hier gelandet bin. Und was bin ich jetzt? Ich stehle Stiefel von Leichen, ich bettle Xenos und anderen Abschaum an, mir Essensreste zuzuwerfen. Der Thron soll mich verdammen, was ist nur aus mir geworden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Bettlers trüben sich und seine Unterlippe zittert. Sein Verstand ist nicht mehr hier, seine Gedanken haben sich nach innen gerichtet.{/n} "Ich ... ich war früher wirklich gläubig. Bevor ich hier gelandet bin. Und was bin ich jetzt? Ich stehle Stiefel von Leichen, ich bettle Xenos und anderen Abschaum an, mir Essensreste zuzuwerfen. Der Thron soll mich verdammen, was ist nur aus mir geworden?"

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du mendiant deviennent soudainement vitreux. La lèvre tremblante, il semble comme absent, plongé dans une sorte d'intense introspection.{/n} « Je... Avant, j'avais la foi. Avant d'atterrir ici. Mais qu'est-ce que je suis, aujourd'hui ? Je dépouille les cadavres de leurs bottes, je mendie auprès des xénos et de toute la vermine que je croise et tout ça pour quoi ? Pour des miettes ! Par le Trône, qu'est-ce que je suis devenu... ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux du mendiant deviennent soudainement vitreux. La lèvre tremblante, il semble comme absent, plongé dans une sorte d'intense introspection.{/n} « Je... Avant, j'avais la foi. Avant d'atterrir ici. Mais qu'est-ce que je suis, aujourd'hui ? Je dépouille les cadavres de leurs bottes, je mendie auprès des xénos et de toute la vermine que je croise et tout ça pour quoi ? Pour des miettes ! Par le Trône, qu'est-ce que je suis devenu... ? »

languages.text: {n}Dilencinin gözleri kararıyor ve alt dudağı titriyor. Zihni artık burada değil. Düşünceleri kendi içine dönüyor.{/n} "Ben... Bir keresinde gerçekten inanmıştım. Buraya düşmeden önce. Şimdi neyim peki? Cesetlerden bot çalıyorum, zenolara ve diğer pisliklerden parça koparmak için yalvarıyorum. Taht belamı versin, neye dönüştüm ben?"
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's eyes glaze over and his lower lip trembles. His mind is no longer here — his thoughts have turned inward.{/n} "I... I really did believe, once. Before I ended up here. And what am I now? I steal boots from corpses, I beg xenos and other scum for scraps. Throne damn it, what's become of me?"
